description: Situated in these premises since 2015, Fausto has become a local favourite thanks to the quality and style of its cuisine which combines classic flavours and regional influences. Two of the chef’s great passions (chocolate and ice cream) always feature on the dessert menu, while the cool outdoor space near the entrance adds to the appeal.
